Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory347.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'Leibowitz... what exactly are they plotting?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1212.jpg', 4: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gestrig Academy', 4: '200'}
{3: 'Flipping the card to its reverse side, another string of text materializes before your eyes—"Gestrig" Academy.'}
{3: 'Operating under Leibowitz, it was where the owner of this card was originally supposed to report for duty.'}
{3: "Academy...? There's no record of any such academy in the Babylonia database, at least not in any section related to Leibowitz."}
{3: 'Which means this "academy" might have been established after Leibowitz Company went into hiding...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'A group of young girls dressed in identical uniforms combating Corrupted...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory347.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'If the place you were supposed to report to is an academy, then the uniformed troops would make sense—they\'re likely "students" of that academy.'}
{3: 'Being able to combat Corrupted... suggests these "students" are likely Constructs. But...'}
{3: 'Why dress Constructs in school uniforms? Or rather, why would students be deployed to the battlefield like this?'}
{3: "The vehicle's bumpy ride jolts you back to reality."}
{3: 'The transport vehicle races across the vast, desolate wilderness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary 1', 3: 'Wait—cap, there seems to be someone lying on the ground ahead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: 'No time to waste. This area is crawling with Corrupted. Finding bodies on the ground is nothing unusual.', 4: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory347.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Following their gaze, you see only ruins at first glance. Upon closer inspection, you notice tiny dancing sparks among the debris.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'That girl—if one can still use such a term—lies amid the ruins as lifeless as the surrounding rebar and rubble.'}
{3: 'Her body appears damaged, with severed mechanical limbs exposing their cross-sections. Short-circuited wires emit sparks—the only feature distinguishing her from the other lifeless debris.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab'}
{1: '1004', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory347.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Is there still a chance to save her?', 3: '55', 4: "That's probably a Construct. We might still have a chance to help her.", 5: '55'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: "...But to a corpse, you can't really call it rescue — it's salvage.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The lead soldier does not contradict you; instead, he offers a coaxing reply.'}
{2: "But she might still be alive, don't you think?", 3: '59'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: 'You sure know how to ask for the impossible, Dear Specialist.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He responds with sarcasm and mockery, but does not outright refuse your request.'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: "We'll take a look when we pass by.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Mid-conversation, the mercenary driving suddenly jerks the wheel, causing the vehicle to swerve violently.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary 1', 3: 'Enemy attack!!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: "What's going on?", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Mercenary 1', 3: "Someone's opening fire on us, cap!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: 'Turn around! Fall back!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Rat-tat-tat-tat—'}
{3: 'Rapid gunfire echoes relentlessly in your ears.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'The transport vehicle zigzags erratically, desperately maneuvering through the hail of bullets.'}
{2: "No, we can't retreat.", 3: '101'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: "At this point, you really don't want to play hero, do you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Blindly turning around in open wilderness with no cover would make us sitting ducks for their bullets...', 3: '104'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: '...Damn it, drive towards those ruins we just passed!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The low, crumbling buildings could shield them from bullets. If they could just reach those ruins, they should be able to find temporary cover...'}
{3: 'The transport vehicle sways violently as it changes course, heading toward the abandoned town.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Rat-tat-tat-tat-tat-tat-tat-tat-tat—'}
{3: 'Strangely, the gunfire not only fails to subside, but actually intensifies.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Eh-? We're still heading forward? It's super dangerous in there..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary 2', 3: 'Damn it! Why are we driving this way? There are only more bullets now!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Still cursing under his breath, he spins around to shout at the team member behind the wheel.'}
{2: 'Mercenary 2', 3: "Drive faster! Shit! I sure as hell don't want to die here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mercenary 1', 3: 'Sit tight, cap!', 4: '2'}
{3: "The gunfire continues, but strangely enough, almost no bullets hit the transport vehicle's critical areas—"}
{3: "Those bullets don't seem intended to attack the transport vehicle; they're more like warnings telling it not to approach this area recklessly."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory756.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Dust begins to rise.'}
{3: 'As the transport vehicle enters the abandoned town, yellow sand gradually engulfs their field of vision.'}
{3: 'As the transport vehicle disappears into the haze, the previously relentless gunfire gradually falls silent.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary 1', 3: 'Did we... did we lose them?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'An uncanny silence falls over their surroundings.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 4: '5'}
{3: 'From the sand-shrouded ruins, a Corrupted suddenly slams against the front windshield. Immediately after, countless pairs of crimson eyes light up from within the dust cloud.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary 1', 3: 'Damn it... did we just ****ing stumble into a Corrupted nest?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'One, two, three—hordes of Corrupted emerge from the mist and charge toward the transport vehicle—'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: 'Lock and load!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Corrupted are crowding in front of the vehicle, making it nearly impossible to move—'}
{2: 'Mercenary Captain', 3: 'Damn it... abandon the vehicle for now!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'He barely pokes half his body out when a large Corrupted lunges toward him.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTRPGTest/FxUiTRPGTest03.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The Corrupted loses its balance and tumbles to the ground like a kite with its string cut.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary 2', 3: 'Whoa—as expected of a specialist! Damn good shooting!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Something doesn't feel right."}
{3: 'That bullet definitely hit its mark squarely.'}
{3: 'But even with a service weapon upgraded by Babylonia, it should be impossible to paralyze such a large Corrupted with just one bullet.'}
{3: 'The Corrupted roars and charges toward you again.'}
{2: '(Fire again)'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTRPGTest/FxUiTRPGTest03.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The bullet strikes it mid-charge, sending its body flying backward from the force of the impact and its own momentum.'}
{3: "What's going on? You only fired once, but there were two gunshots through the dust cloud."}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'What an awkward introduction.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Through the swirling dust, the silhouette of a girl in black clothing flickers in and out of view from a higher vantage point.'}
{2: 'Who?', 3: '202', 4: '(Raise gun and aim at her)', 5: '203'}
{2: '???', 3: "I'm a Corrupted... coming to eat you up! Now, are you going to shoot?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A girl appearing during a sudden Corrupted surge makes no sense. Your instincts made you raise your weapon without thinking.'}
{3: "The girl's laughter rings through the windblown sand."}
{3: 'But in the blink of an eye, the black silhouette vanishes like a ghost.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTransfiniteMain/FxUiTransfiniteGlow.prefab'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the sandstorm gradually subsides, a wave of Corrupted surges forward.'}
{2: '(Continue shooting)', 3: '214'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTRPGTest/FxUiTRPGTest03.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTRPGTest/FxUiTRPGTest03.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Two gunshots ring out again, and the targeted Corrupted falls instantly.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, an interesting thought pops into your head.'}
{2: '(Deliberately miss the shot)', 3: '226'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTRPGTest/FxUiTRPGTest03.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTRPGTest/FxUiTRPGTest03.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Just as expected—the Corrupted falls anyway, even though your bullet missed completely.'}
{3: 'Someone is assisting you from the shadows. But... who exactly is this person?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1232.jpg'}
{3: 'You watch as the transport vehicle ignores the warning shots and charges straight into the abandoned town swarming with Corrupted.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Sigh... they just won't listen... There are loads of Corrupted over there, you know. If something goes wrong, don't blame me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl yawns out of boredom and passes her black gun to her tail behind her.'}
{3: 'She perches on the roof of a wooden cabin, leisurely swinging her legs.'}
{3: "She can't figure out why that transport vehicle would stubbornly press forward even after it had been warned by gunfire."}
{3: "Gazing into the distance, she knows her companion's remains lie buried somewhere in those ruins."}
{3: "That's her real purpose for coming here—to recover the body that was so carelessly discarded."}
{3: "She stands up, ready to rush toward her companion's location, but her body suddenly freezes."}
{3: 'Why is that transport vehicle... still heading toward the exact ruins where her companion lies?'}
{3: 'Is it just a coincidence...?'}
{3: 'With a resigned sigh, she takes the gun from her tail, aims at the Corrupted, and prepares to fire again.'}
{3: 'She is synchronized with something.'}
{3: "A strange feeling. Her signal... seems to be synchronized with someone else's."}
{3: 'The other person... is loading their weapon, raising their gun sideways, quickly taking aim, pulling the trigger—she perceives their every movement with crystal clarity.'}
{3: "Who is it? Where? Her visual modules dart back and forth, desperately scanning for the shooter's position—"}
{3: 'A figure in an exoskeleton combat suit looks somewhat bedraggled beneath the thick clouds of dust blotting out the sky.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'What an awkward introduction.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She can't help but find herself intrigued."}
{3: 'Loading—aiming—pulling the trigger... to her, these are distinct actions happening in slow-motion that she can easily break down and analyze.'}
{3: 'So she mimics those slow movements, deliberately raising her gun barrel.'}
